name: David Wilson
text: Had a great experience with James. He lowered my payment for me and did a great job! If you are in the market for a vehicle at a great price go see all American Ford

name: Will Lee
text: Great experience with salesman Dink Tucker. Polite, not overbearing on getting the car sold, and very personable. Car was as advertised, great communication throughout the decision to purchase my first new vehicle. Thanks again!

name: shae tindall
text: Chelsea Smith was great! She was able to get me a better deal than my bank! She was the absolute sweetest!

name: Alex Hyde
text: This was my first time buying a car and it could not have gone any better! Dink Tucker is a pro and he now has a life long customer!  You will not be disappointed if you visit , and make sure to tell him Alex sent you!

name: Raymond Ashley
text: I recently purchased a 2020 Dodge Durango. My experience was great. I drove further than I wanted but it was worth it. Great service by all. Really great interest rate. I would purchase there again. You should too.

name: Alice Robinson
text: I always get great service and treated kind when I take my 2018 ecosport in for oil change!! Thank u!!

name: Eddie Smith
text: The guys in parts are great ,very helpful and accommodating! Friends as well, awesome!!

name: shacklferd rust
text: Friendly environment and knowledge staff very fair pricing

name: Jr Reid
text: Huge shout out to Alex and Jeremy for making buying a car so easy

name: Scott Cosner
text: Fantastic experience with Dink and Chelsea.

name: Cheryl Adams
text: Extremely AWESOME dealership.  The best employees who go above and beyond.  Very highly recommended

name: Lanna Hogeland
text: Great service, thank you James Russell!

name: Michael Sanchez
text: I want to publicly give praise to the salesman Alex Sanchez! He is quite possibly one of the best salesmen I've ever had to buy a car from. He showed me different options based on what I asked for, and steered me in the right direction for me! Best attitude I've ever seen and had the best manners! His parents must be proud! Give that man a raise!! I will definitely be coming back just for him.

name: Blooms & Branches
text: Wish there was more stars to give Alex Sanchez, he helped me from the time I walked in till I walked out, he helped find a vehicle that fits all my needs and one that I would not be paying the rest of my life on. Very easy guy to work with! Definitely much different from other car salesmen Alex likes to make sure his customers are satisfied with no worries when they leave. Will definitely be back to see him again! Thanks Alex keep up the hard work buddy.

name: Zion (NautiB3ar)
text: Great Staff! Ask for Alex Alex Sanchez, he helped me find something in my price range. Although I didn't make a purchase, I know where I'm going when I get financially ready. Wonderful service, good conversation, informative, and a overall rad experience. 20/10 would recommend

name: Victoria Golden
text: I stopped by this lot really needing a lot of guidance. I had an idea about what I wanted but needed a little bit more information before I made my decision. Alex was a great help. He was great to work with and he helped me get a really great deal on a vehicle. These kinds of things always stress me out and he made it so easy. Highly recommend.

name: Nikki Shirley
text: Totally satisfied with the service. I don't know much about buying cars, but Alex was incredibly kind and patient with me. He explained how the process worked, and helped me find what would be best for my family. Plus he was able to work with me in financing. 15/10. I will not go anywhere else.

name: Matthew Brooks
text: What can I say except, "wow!" If I had a dollar for every time a car salesman tried to give me the short end of the stick I'd be completely broke because I only work with the best. And the best is Alex Sanchez. Truly unbelievable service the likes of which have never been seen before.

name: Maggie Allinder
text: I would have to say that my experience here was absolutely delightful! Not only was the staff kind, but Mr. Sanchez listened to me and my specific needs, helping me find a car that fit ME! I had a budget set and Mr. Sanchez was so kind as to help me right away! It's so hard to find a salesman who actually cares for his clients. I will never forget this!

name: Emily Kirbow
text: Cannot recommend this dealership enough! Amazing staff that actually care and want to put you in the right vehicle you will love! If you’re planning to go, make triple sure you ask for Alex Sanchez! He will get you in the right car within your budget!

name: KittenCrisp
text: All American helped me out with my first time getting a car. Alex Sanchez did an AMAZING job working with me and my (admittedly) terrible credit. He showed me cars within my budget, and made it possible for me to have the car I wanted. They even offer a free oil change with a purchase, which is amazing if you're low on funds and it's about that time. Even then, it would've only have been a little over $14, which I think is great. Everyone is so friendly and kind, and is willing to work with you. I definitely recommend them if you're looking to trade in or purchase a new car!

name: Janet Hernandez
text: Alex was a great help to me and my family! Highly recommend him to anyone looking for a new vehicle. Will definitely return when I'm buying again!!

name: Alejandro Sanchez
text: Dank place for dank deals. This place is the best out there. Management is great, they worked with me and my situation. I highly recommend, Alex, my salesman. That boy was kind and caring and really heard me out.

name: Jordan Simon
text: This dealership is amazing and I attribute my experiences there to Alex Sanchez. He went above and beyond in helping me find a truck for my sweet daughter. He was very patient and didn’t try to upsell me anything we didn’t need. I definitely recommend going here and asking for him!!

name: Alan Whitehead
text: Just wanted to let you know, should you visit this dealership, please seek out Alex Sanchez. He is more of a long time friend than a car salesman. Absolutely no pressure whatsoever. I appreciate such when I shop for a vehicle.

name: Jason Keller
text: This place has some of the best prices out there! I highly recommend this place and also Alex Sanchez as your salesman! Could not have been more satisfied with my experience here!

name: Andrea Zamora
text: Hands down the best dealership. They have the best staff. If you are not sure what kind of vehicle you want, the sales people will go out of there way to find the perfect car for you! If you are looking for a new car definitely go check them out.

name: Noman Irfan
text: Alex Sanchez was by the most friendly and informative salesmen I have ever met in my life. Not only was he able to make the process easy to do, he also made sure I left with a car that I have yet to have any complaints about. I can't recommend this place and himself enough!

name: Noman Irfan
text: I've had the pleasure of working with Alex Sanchez to finally get a car at last! Not only did he make the process simple, he was able to explain features very thoroughly to me despite me not knowing anything about cars! I would highly recommend asking for Alex next time you are here!

name: Tommy M
text: If y'all are looking for a great deal with great service All American CDJR is definitely the place to go. The sales people are pleasant and knowledgeable. They ALL will go the extra mile for any customer.

name: Papa James
text: I went in asking about a truck , I took my trade in truck with me . It was looked at. I waited for a few days ,asked a few times to see what it was worth . It depends on what you are buying is what I found out. I did go somewhere else to buy a new truck . The trade number I got was way low compared to every other dealer I took the truck too. Own 3 dodge trucks,  super high credit score, bought a 2019 ram 3500 new from another dealer .

name: Dylan McCombs
text: James was a huge help in me buying my first car! Highly recommend!

name: Alex Binion
text: I had a great experience here and know that I will be back. They take care of their clientele, and Alex Sanchez was a huge help! Thanks again.

name: Jeffrey Kirbow
text: All American CDJR is the place to go to find a new or used vehicle. I spent a great few hours with a great salesman, Alex Sanchez. He helped me find what I was looking for and was very knowledgeable about the inventory. If you want to be treated right and fair, go see Alex at All American.

name: Tina Cole
text: Great experience.  Our sales person was Alex Sanchez.  He worked with us to get the payment where we needed it and worked with us on our down payment.  We will never use another car dealership other than All American Ford and we will always ask for Alex.

name: Fallen Angel
text: Buy vehicles from here hands down. I highly reccomend the place, great staff, great attitudes, very knowledgeable about the vehicles. I reccomend asking for Alex Sanchez, he was immensely helpful in my search for my new car and I wont be going anywhere else for one. Thanks guys

name: Tamica Stewart
text: You won't find a better associate than Caleb Hollingsworth. He is friendly, knowledgeable, and polite. He really is excellent, and  goes above and beyond!

name: Brent Campbell
text: I usually don’t go out of the way to give reviews, but I wanted to make sure Alex Sanchez gets some more recognition for his awesome work!

name: Seth Noblitt
text: Had a great experience thanks to Caleb Hollingsworth. I recommend him to anyone.

name: Kris Tanner
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is the best salesman! My husband was in the dealership having a recall replaced. Caleb was knowledgeable and helpful concerning purchase options for our family. Thank you, Caleb!

name: fernanda perez
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is extremely helpful and so nice. I will definitely be purchasing from him when the time comes.

name: antonio tutt
text: Looking for the best customer service ask for Alex he will provide the best customer experience for you. Be sure to ask for him highly recommended!

name: Sunnie Reagan
text: Caleb did a great job and had excellent customer service. Great experience!

name: Robert Eaton
text: Staff was great.  Dodge offers many rebates.  I couldn't find a dodge truck that met what I was looking for but I did end up getting a great deal on a F-150.

name: Rhinu
text: Caleb Hollingsworth was extremely insightful and very helpful, I was just browsing and he still took his time and showed me around and gave me ideas for my price and needs, when I buy my vehicle they've got my business and a fan

name: maria perez
text: Caleb Hollingsworth is very knowledgeable and super nice, make sure you go see him!

name: Kim Eubanks

text: Great customer service and a wide variety of cars, used and new, without spending too much money!

name: Michael Thomas
text: Great place with a wide selection to choose from! Very friendly staff, ask for Alex and he'll make sure you get what you came for!

name: Catherine Mccown
text: Thankful to have found a dealership as well as a salesperson to make the car buying process less stressful. I wouldn’t dare go anywhere other than here thanks to the help of Alex Sanchez!

name: StarPlatinumVG
text:
(Translated by Google) 5 stars. THIS.

(Original)
5 stars. EZ.

name: Dennis Zink
text: I drive a 2007 Honda Odyssey van with 221,000 miles on it.  Except for a few rattles, this has been a wonderful car.  Just purchased a new 2016 Pilot for my wife and I am expecting the same service that my Odyssey has given.  My van now has 280,000 miles

name: Ryan Floyd
text: Love working there but could fix a few things... But most of all my rating is for the quality, dedication, hard work, and effort we all put into the vehicles to make sure that are the safest for people and their families...

name: Meagan G
text: I am absolutely disgusted with the way non-HMA employees are treated. It seems like there is no opportunity for full hire-ons and the contractor management is terrible. Management should be re-evaluated... or better yet, place people with more experience and can PROPERLY communicate with others in management positions.

name: Annette Moreland
text: So far so good. No complaints

name: Art Of Valor
text: Great employer with competitive pay and benefits. Employees here work very hard and are passionate about the product they manufacture.

name: Edward McDaniel
text:
Overall good employer. Pay is good, benefits are good, bonuses are good. We work a lot, but overtime is one of those "either working to much or not enough." Guess I'd rather work to much than not enough. I don't have anything negative to say about HMA, it's like other places of employment: not perfect. Recently purchased my first honda auto (2019 accord LX) so far so good. I'll honestly say it feels good to drive a Honda, be employed with Honda, and witness multiple Honda products in use. Rather it range from a motorcycle to a lawnmower.

I'm thankful.

name: Maggie Ambrose
text: I own a 1998 Honda Accord LX- 5 speed. It runs great! It doesn't move though... why you say?... one teeny tiny little piece that connects the clutch line to the slave cylinder that was NEVER made available for purchase... even to the dealerships. This piece is separate from the clutch line AND from the slave cylinder. According to multiple HONDA sources (a dealership and this manufacturing facility among the sources) it was only used in a few cars before Honda decided it was a design flaw... my car being one of them. It was replaced by a $300 hose with this piece attached to it! Honda refuses to help in any way because I haven't and cannot afford to take it to one of their dealerships to have it fixed... even though my car is being repaired by a licensed, reputable mechanic. They have a "very good working relationship" with their dealerships. I guess so. Seems to me that if they made the part seperate from those aforementioned components in even one car they should make it available for purchase or have a recall to remedy their "design flaw". I believe the design flaw was that they could make more money by attaching it to the hose, thus forcing the customer to purchase the entire hose, whether the hose is good or not.

name: Kevin Thompson
text: Best thing to happen in the area period.  Not for everyone obviously but the economic impact has been more than anyone could imagine.  I don't think most people understand the true impact of this business in the state of Alabama.  A great placeto work.

name: Miguel Acosta
text: I am the owner of a 2006 Honda Odyssey Touring van, the most expensive model. By 5 years time, the midnight blue paint was starting to peel in numerous places, as a first time Honda Buyer, you know just how important first impressions are, well I am stuck with a Honda Odyssey that needs to be re-painted, not ever going to try to even drive another Honda ever again, just check online before buying a Honda Odyssey 2013, you will see how many people globally are having this problem with Honda Paint Peeling. I would not recommend, buying a Honda Odyssey unless you are certain the paint warranty is longer than 36K,36 months, thats about all that their paint is good for on Odysseys and once your out of warranty your on your own.

name: April Ford
text: Wished that the company would be a little more family oriented on certain involvements they setup.

name: Abdullahi ali
text: They send you back and ford in dock doors but quick unload

name: Lee ImageHunter
text: I own Honda vehicles since 1973 and i love it...waiting now for the new Ridgeline, but no news when hits the car dealers in Florida...they mention spring 2016 but i called America Honda in California and they dont know yet when will be available😂😂😂

name: John Henry
text: Laura, I think they do, but when you have over 4,000 employees it's hard to get around to everyone real soon. I'm sure if he's bragging about it, it will get back to his TC or TM and he will be taking a little visit to medical for testing.

text: Nice people and quick to load and unload.

name: rafael leon
text:
(Translated by Google) I do not recommend working here, they do not value your work, only their people can do what they want and if you do not agree, you will be dismissed by canceling your batch and throwing yourself into security, I will work for almost a year and you realize how it is that they need better control if you you say what's wrong you get fired you have to be right about everything

(Original)
No recomiendo trabajar aqui no valoran tu trabajo solo su gente puede hacer lo que quiera y si no estas de acurrdo te despiser cancelando tu batch y echandote al secury yo trabaje por casi un año y te das cuenta de como es eso nesecitan mejor control si tu dices lo que esta mal te despiden tienes que estar de acurrdo en todo

name: neskens Maita
text:
(Translated by Google) HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO THE WORST SALES AND AFTER SALES EXPERIENCE I have ever received at a dealership in my life !!!. READ THE HISTORY OF A NEW 2019 HONDA ODYSSEY, WITH 400 MILES THAT HAD TRANSMISSION NEUTRALIZED BY TURNING ON THE LIGHTS ON THE DASHBOARD.

This vehicle was towed 2 times to the HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO. THAT'S WHY I DON'T WANT THAT ODYSSEY BECAUSE IT IS A RISK FOR MY FAMILY.

So far I have not changed the truck or the HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO dealer, or the HONDA car factory.

SHOPPING EXPERIENCE

On Tuesday 13 / Nov / 2019, the seller WILBERT RODRIGUEZ showed me the ODYSSEY EXL, but after giving me information about the monthly payments, it was not available to me. He offered me the EX model, but I told him that I was not going to continue with the purchase; Well, for me it was a problem that I did not have the entertainment system for my children (BLUE RAY OR DVD), he told me that this was not a problem; that we could try for the EX and they added the entertainment system to me, I insisted several times on the subject because for me it is a familiar subject. The sale was made and it was a hoax, they didn't give me the system.

AFTER SALES EXPERIENCE AND FAILURE OF THE 2019 HONDA ODYSSEY EX

On 16 / Nov / 2018 MY HONDA ODYSSEY HAD THE TRANSMISSION NEUTRALIZED, it said on the dashboard park in a safe place, check transmission, check emission of gases and the blind spot indicator light. I called the dealer several times, the WILBERT salesperson, the service department, they never answered me, left messages and never returned my call. Call the HONDA route assistance service which also took several minutes to attend to me; They sent me a crane from AAA.

They changed the battery and restored the electrical system of the ODYSSEY 2019. They give it back to me.

On 17 / Nov / 2018 the fault returned and the transmission was neutralized again; I left the vehicle in service. I make the exception of that moment that I do not want the truck because I feel insecure in it, it is not a glass that does not rise or a door that does not close, IT IS A PREGNANT SITUATION for a vehicle to neutralize you and thereby put you at RISK TO YOUR FAMILY.

Gentlemen of HONDA, I express to you through these lines, I bought a vehicle to enjoy with my family, I did not buy a problem, I refuse to accept being the guinea pig of a fault of the HONDA brand.

JASON WHITTEN general sales manager informally told me that was a problem that HONDA AMERICA had to solve because they don't make cars that only sell them.

(Original)
HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO LA PEOR EXPERIENCIA DE VENTA Y POST VENTA que he recibido en un concesionario en mi vida!!!.  LEA LA HISTORIA DE UNA HONDA ODYSSEY NUEVA  2019, CON 400 MILLAS QUE SE LE NEUTRALIZÓ LA TRANSMISION PRENDIENDO TESTIGOS DE LUCES EN EL TABLERO.

Este vehículo fue trasladado 2 veces en grúa a la HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO. POR ELLO NO QUIERO ESA ODYSSEY PORQUE ES UN RIESGO PARA MI FAMILIA.

Hasta ahora no me cambian la camioneta ni el concesionario HONDA COGGIN ORLANDO, ni la fábrica de los autos HONDA.

EXPERIENCIA DE COMPRA

El martes 13/Nov/2019, el vendedor WILBERT RODRIGUEZ me mostró la ODYSSEY EXL, pero después de darme información sobre los pagos mensuales la misma no estaba a mi alcance. El me ofreció el modelo EX, pero le dije que no iba a continuar con la compra; pues para mí era un problema que no tenía el sistema de entretenimiento para mis hijos (BLUE RAY O DVD), él me manifestó que esto no era un problema; que podíamos intentar por la EX y ellos me agregaban el sistema de entretenimiento, le insistí varias veces sobre el tema porque para mí es un tema familiar. Se dio la venta y fue un engaño no me dieron el sistema.

EXPERIENCIA POST VENTA Y FALLA DEL HONDA ODYSSEY EX 2019

El 16/nov/2018 MI HONDA ODYSSEY SE LE NEUTRALIZO LA TRANSMISION decía en el tablero estaciónese en un lugar seguro, revisar transmisión, revisar emisión de gases y la luz de testigo del punto ciego. llame varias veces al concesionario, al vendedor WILBERT, al departamento de servicio, nunca me atendieron, deje mensajes y jamás me devolvieron la llamada. Llame al servicio de asistencia de ruta de HONDA el cual también tardo varios minutos en atenderme; me mandaron una grúa de AAA.

Cambiaron la batería y restauraron el sistema eléctrico de la ODYSSEY 2019. Me la entregan de vuelta.

El 17/Nov/2018 vuelve a presentar la falla y la transmisión se neutraliza nuevamente; dejé el vehículo en servicio. Hago la salvedad de ese momento que no quiero la camioneta pues me siento inseguro en ella, no se trata de un vidrio que no sube o una puerta que no cierra, ES UNA SITUACION EMBARAZOSA que un vehículo se te neutralice y con ello pongas en RIESGO A TU FAMILIA.

Señores de HONDA, les expreso a través de estas líneas, compré un vehículo para disfrutar con mi familia, no compré un problema, me niego a aceptar ser el conejillo de indias de una falla de la marca HONDA.

JASON WHITTEN gerente general de ventas de manera informal me dijo eso era un problema que tenía que resolver la HONDA AMERICA que ellos no fabrican carros que solo los venden.
